app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/2076-393X/8/1/80/s1, Table S1a: Viraemic Phase: qPCR results indicating presence of FMDV RNA (the Cp values) in blood, oral swabs, nasal swabs and probang samples from 0 to 35 days post challenge. Animals were vaccinated with two different vaccines and challenged at 7- or 21-days post vaccination with a heterologous virus along with UVC group, Table S1b: Post-viraemic Phase: qPCR results indicating presence of FMDV RNA (the Cp values) in blood, oral swabs, nasal swabs and probang samples from 0 to 35 days post challenge. Animals were vaccinated with two different vaccines and challenged at 7- or 21-days post vaccination with a heterologous virus along with UVC group.
